subject: how to draw a bargraph with Chart::Graph::Gnuplot
body:
hi everybody,
I have a big problem about bargraph....
it seems that it only draws lines using the Chart::Graph::Gnuplot
module.
But I need to draw a horizonal bargraph now...
How to do that?

Thanks a lot..

Best Regards,
xu
